description.value:
Your surgery can bring a patient back from the brink of death, but might push them over the edge. When you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Treat Wounds]{Treat Wounds}, you can deal [[/r 1d8[slashing]]] damage to your patient just before applying the effects of Treat Wounds.

If you do, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your Medicine check to Treat Wounds, and if you roll a success, you get a critical success instead.
